steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fj7hf","text":"Express VLDLR-C-tag in HEK293E cells cultured in FreeStyle 293 Expression Medium for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4onem","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":345600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1r1n9","text":"Load dialyzed conditioned medium onto a CaptureSelect C-tag affinity column previously equilibrated with binding buffer (column volume, CV: 4 mL slurry for 300 mL dialyzed media) by gravity flow at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":198,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ctd2v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ajpv","text":"Wash the column with 5 CV of Binding buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2l1a","text":"Elute VLDLR-C-tag protein with 6x 1 mL of Elution buffer. Collect fractions of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e9sem","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"did7f","text":"Analyze eluted fraction by SDS-PAGE and Coomassie blue staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26b6e","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"lkq9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":452,"id":440386,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pqcebixhp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pqccbixhp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pqcdbixhp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pqcbbixhp.webp","width":401}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7gnnj","text":"Exchange protein buffer to Binding buffer with a NAP-25 desalting column previously equilibrated with Binding buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"71qu0","text":"Collect the fractions containing protein, concentrate by ultrafiltration to \u003e1 mg mL-1, aliquot and flash-freeze purified VLDLR-C-tag in liquid nitrogen for storage at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":168,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2a8j9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ecksi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ff3kf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-70","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"51m9l","text":"Approximate yield: From 300 ml of conditioned media around 0.6 mg of pure VLDLR-C-tag were obtained. Yield can be significantly increased if the VLDLR chaperone, RAP is co-overexpressed during protein production.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
